mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (iadmin, title, ctnt, importance) VALUES (#{iadmin},#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{importance})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET ctnt = #{ctnt}, title = #{title}, importance = #{importance}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.select: SELECT iboard, iadmin, title,importance, created_at createdAt, del_yn delYn, board_view boardView FROM board WHERE importance = 0 AND del_yn = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{staIdx}, #{row}
SELECT iboard, iadmin, title, importance, created_at createdAt, del_yn delYn, board_view boardView FROM board WHERE importance = 1 AND del_yn = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT iboard, iadmin, title, ctnt, importance, created_at createdAt, del_yn delYn FROM board WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND del_yn = 0

SELECT iboard, iadmin, title,importance, created_at createdAt, del_yn delYn, board_view boardView FROM board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND del_yn = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{staIdx}, #{row}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND del_yn = 0
